title: Garen
body: So as a rengar main im scared what hes gona look like but he was op thats true no counter play but wher is the counter play for garens q or his ult can some one tell me that ?

replies.body:
Atleast you can stay out of his range. That wasnt or isnt possible against a fed Rengar ...

and btw. this is the german boarder ;)

If you are Ranged, you can poke Garen down, so that his passive does not activate. 
If you have enough burst, you can all in Garen since he has pretty long cooldowns. 
If neither of the conditions above is true then you probably have a losing lane and have to do what you always should do on losing lanes Try to cs as much as possible don't die even if it means to give up farm (then he can be killed by your adc). Most Champs have more utility than a Garen and thus are more useful in teamfights. Garen is only good in lane. He is neither a good splitpusher nor a good teamfighter (melee but no good engage). Rengar can at least try to kill the squishy targets or use a ranged CC.
Banshees for his Q. Steraks or GA for his Ultimate.
